channel.title: MoparClassic webclient issues
channel.description:
So right now, what is working correctly? Is there a client we can run from computer?
The webclient is VERY unstable for me, when i go to: www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape4.php and choose RSC it loads up (not always though) but i get error when trying to login.
When i go to: https://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape4.php?version=RSC&customBackground=http://i42.tinypic.com/nvbax2.jpg i can't get the client to load up at all.. neither in IE nore Srware Iron.
Also, the game reso is too small in my browser, i can't see the chat nore worldmap and inventory.
So overall, the webclient is unable to play since it's very unreliable and unstable, could someone provide an external client?

item.title: MoparClassic webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Is the server offline? The webclient is failing to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Well can you check it out for me?

Also, you can load moparscape in a separate browser window and do the same thing with it.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @dexto dexto
item.description:
@dexto wrote:

I’m using a external client that cff provided, webclient is unstable and not compact.
external client can easily tuck it in he background or just move it around on ur screen unlike a web browser…

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, I have another question about your ‘resolution’ problem. I can’t re-create what you see in chrome either.

Do you see the console when the bottom of the RSC client is hidden? Run it in debug mode and see if it tells you anything.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic webclient issues
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

vortex:

On Chrome, when I close the tab the applet is running on, it keeps running and playing the music until the current song finishes

That happened to me too, but the webby crashed before I closed the tab, I posted the error somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic webclient issues

item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:436973”]It seems to work fine for everyone else, besides the HTML issue in chrome (hiding the bottom of the client).

What version of java are you using?[/quote]I have no issues, and I use Chrome exclusively.
